CHARLEY PRIVACY POLICY

Last Updated: July 14, 2025 | Effective Date: July 14, 2025
IMPORTANT: This Privacy Policy has been enhanced to provide greater transparency about our data practices, including AI training, international transfers, and comprehensive user rights. Please review all sections carefully.
AI AND MACHINE LEARNING NOTICE: We use artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies to improve your experience. This includes using your content and interactions to train our AI systems for matching, safety, and personalization purposes. You have rights regarding AI training - see Section 8 for details.

Welcome to CHARLEY's enhanced Privacy Policy. This policy describes how Baobab Technologies, Inc. ("CHARLEY," "Company," "we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, shares, and protects your personal information when you use our comprehensive dating, networking, and social connection platform and related services (collectively, the "Services").

1. INFORMATION WE COLLECT

1.1 Information You Provide to Us

Account and Profile Information:

  • Basic account details: Name, email address, phone number, date of birth, password
  • Profile information: Photos, bio, interests, preferences, education, profession
  • Verification documents: Government-issued ID, verification photos, identity confirmation
  • Communication preferences: Notification settings, privacy controls, blocking preferences

Communication and Interaction Data:

  • Messages, calls, and other communications through our Services
  • Likes, matches, and interaction history with other users
  • Reports, feedback, and customer support communications
  • Survey responses and research participation data

Financial Information:

  • Payment details for premium subscriptions (processed securely by third-party providers)
  • Transaction history and billing information
  • Refund and dispute information

1.2 Information We Collect Automatically

Device and Technical Information:

  • Device type, model, operating system, and version
  • Unique device identifiers and mobile advertising IDs
  • IP addresses, browser type, and language preferences
  • Network connection information and service provider

Usage and Activity Information:

  • App features used, screens viewed, and interaction patterns
  • Time spent on different features and session duration
  • Search queries and content preferences
  • Performance data and error reports

Location Information:

  • Precise location data (with explicit permission)
  • Approximate location based on IP address
  • Location history and movement patterns (when enabled)

1.3 Information from Third Parties

We may receive information from:

  • Social media platforms when you connect your accounts
  • Identity verification services and background check providers
  • Payment processors and app stores
  • Analytics and advertising partners
  • Other users who report or reference you

2. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION

2.1 Core Service Functionality

Account and Profile Management:

  • Create, maintain, and authenticate your account
  • Display your profile to other users according to your settings
  • Verify your identity and age to ensure platform safety
  • Manage your preferences and privacy settings

Matching and Connections:

  • Match you with other users based on compatibility algorithms
  • Analyze preferences and behavior to improve matching accuracy
  • Enable communication between matched users
  • Suggest potential connections and recommendations

Payment and Subscription Services:

  • Process payments for premium features and subscriptions
  • Manage billing, refunds, and account upgrades
  • Prevent fraud and unauthorized transactions

2.2 AI Training and Machine Learning

We use your content and interactions to train and improve our AI systems for:

Matching and Compatibility:

  • Developing algorithms to suggest compatible matches
  • Analyzing communication patterns to improve compatibility scoring
  • Personalizing recommendations based on user behavior
  • Optimizing matching criteria and success rates

Safety and Moderation:

  • Training systems to detect harassment, spam, and inappropriate content
  • Developing fraud detection and prevention algorithms
  • Improving automated moderation and safety features
  • Analyzing patterns to identify potential safety threats

Personalization and Experience:

  • Customizing app features and content recommendations
  • Improving user interface and experience optimization
  • Developing new features based on usage patterns
  • Enhancing search and discovery algorithms

Opt-Out Rights: You may opt out of AI training by contacting privacy@btechnos.com. Note that opting out may limit certain features and personalization capabilities.

2.3 Platform Safety and Security

Safety Measures:

  • Detect and prevent spam, fraud, and harmful behavior
  • Monitor for violations of our Terms of Service and Community Guidelines
  • Investigate reports of abuse, harassment, or inappropriate content
  • Implement user protection measures and safety features
  • Respond to legal obligations and law enforcement requests

Security Operations:

  • Maintain platform security and prevent unauthorized access
  • Detect and respond to security threats and vulnerabilities
  • Backup and recovery operations for service continuity
  • Account recovery and identity verification processes

3. INFORMATION SHARING AND DISCLOSURE

3.1 With Other Users

Profile Information Sharing:

  • Profile information you choose to make visible (photos, bio, interests)
  • Activity status and online presence (if enabled)
  • Mutual connections and shared interests
  • Verification status and badges

Communication Sharing:

  • Direct messages and communications with matched users
  • Reaction and interaction history within conversations
  • Read receipts and message status (if enabled)

3.2 With Service Providers and Partners

Essential Service Providers:

  • Cloud storage and hosting providers for secure data storage
  • Payment processors for subscription and transaction processing
  • Identity verification and background check services
  • Customer support and communication platforms

Analytics and Improvement Partners:

  • Analytics providers for usage statistics and performance monitoring
  • Research partners for platform improvement and feature development
  • Security providers for fraud detection and prevention

Marketing and Advertising Partners:

  • Advertising networks for targeted marketing (with consent)
  • Social media platforms for social login and sharing features
  • Email and SMS providers for communication services

3.3 Legal and Safety Disclosures

Legal Requirements:

  • When required by law, regulation, or court order
  • To comply with legal process and government requests
  • For tax reporting and regulatory compliance
  • In response to valid law enforcement requests

Safety and Protection:

  • To protect the safety and security of our users
  • To prevent fraud, abuse, or violations of our Terms
  • To investigate illegal activities or safety threats
  • To protect CHARLEY's rights and property

Business Transfers:

  • In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
  • During corporate restructuring or bankruptcy proceedings
  • To successors in interest or assigns

4. INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFERS

Cross-Border Data Processing:

Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own, including the United States. We ensure appropriate safeguards through:

  • Standard Contractual Clauses: EU-approved contractual terms with service providers
  • Adequacy Decisions: Transfers to countries with adequate data protection laws
  • Binding Corporate Rules: Internal policies for data transfers within our organization
  • Explicit Consent: Your specific consent for transfers where required

Data Processing Locations:

Data Type Primary Location Safeguards
User Profiles United States Standard Contractual Clauses
Messages United States Encryption + Contractual Protection
Payment Data Processor Location PCI DSS Compliance
Analytics Multiple Regions Anonymization + Contracts

5. DATA RETENTION AND DELETION

5.1 Retention Periods

Active Account Data:

  • Profile information: Retained while account is active
  • Messages: Retained for 7 years for safety and legal purposes
  • Photos: Retained while account is active plus 30 days
  • Activity logs: Retained for 2 years for security purposes

Deleted Account Data:

  • Profile information: Deleted within 30 days of account deletion
  • Messages: Retained for 90 days for safety investigations
  • Safety reports: Retained for 5 years for legal compliance
  • Payment records: Retained for 7 years for tax purposes

5.2 Account Deletion Process

User-Initiated Deletion:

  • You can delete your account through app settings at any time
  • Account deletion is permanent and cannot be undone
  • Some data may be retained for legal, safety, or business purposes
  • You will receive confirmation of successful deletion

Data Removal Timeline:

  • Profile visibility: Removed immediately
  • Personal data: Deleted within 30 days
  • Backup systems: Cleared within 90 days
  • Legal hold data: Retained as required by law

6. YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS AND CHOICES

6.1 General Rights

Access and Control:

  • Access your personal information and download your data
  • Update or correct inaccurate information
  • Delete your account and personal information
  • Control privacy settings and visibility preferences

Communication Preferences:

  • Opt out of promotional emails and notifications
  • Control push notifications and alert preferences
  • Manage marketing and advertising communications
  • Receive important service-related messages

6.2 Regional Privacy Rights

European Users (GDPR):

  • Right to access your personal data and processing details
  • Right to rectification of inaccurate or incomplete data
  • Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
  • Right to restrict processing in certain circumstances
  • Right to data portability in machine-readable format
  • Right to object to processing for direct marketing
  • Right to withdraw consent at any time

California Users (CCPA):

  • Right to know what personal information is collected
  • Right to delete personal information
  • Right to opt out of the sale of personal information
  • Right to non-discrimination for exercising privacy rights
  • Right to correct inaccurate personal information

6.3 Exercising Your Rights

How to Submit Requests:

  • Through in-app privacy settings and controls
  • By emailing privacy@btechnos.com
  • Through our online privacy request form
  • By contacting customer support

Verification Process:

  • We will verify your identity before processing requests
  • Response time: 30 days for most requests
  • Complex requests may take up to 90 days
  • You will receive confirmation of completed requests

7. DATA SECURITY

Technical Safeguards:

  • End-to-end encryption for sensitive communications
  • Advanced encryption for data storage and transmission
  • Multi-factor authentication for account access
  • Regular security audits and penetration testing
  • Secure coding practices and vulnerability assessments

Organizational Measures:

  • Employee training on data protection and privacy
  • Access controls and need-to-know principles
  • Regular security awareness and compliance programs
  • Incident response and breach notification procedures
  • Third-party security assessments and audits

Security Disclaimer: While we implement industry-standard security measures, no system is completely secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security but will notify you of any material breaches as required by law.

8. AI TRAINING AND AUTOMATED PROCESSING

Machine Learning Operations:

  • We use AI to improve matching algorithms and user experience
  • Your interactions help train our safety and moderation systems
  • AI-generated content and recommendations may not always be accurate
  • You can opt out of AI training while maintaining core functionality

Automated Decision-Making:

  • Account verification and identity confirmation processes
  • Content moderation and safety enforcement
  • Matching suggestions and compatibility scoring
  • Fraud detection and prevention measures

Your Rights Regarding AI:

  • Right to human review of automated decisions
  • Right to explanation of algorithmic decision-making
  • Right to opt out of AI training (with potential feature limitations)
  • Right to challenge automated moderation decisions

9. CHILDREN'S PRIVACY

Age-Appropriate Services:

  • Dating features (MEET/HEAT) are restricted to users 18 and older
  • Professional networking (SUITE) is available to users 14 and older
  • We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13
  • Additional protections apply to users under 18

Parental Rights:

  • Parents can request deletion of their child's data
  • Enhanced privacy protections for users under 18
  • Restricted data sharing for minor users
  • Parental notification for certain activities

10. CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

Policy Updates:

  • We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices
  • Material changes will be notified through email or in-app notifications
  • You will have the opportunity to review changes before they take effect
  • Continued use of our Services constitutes acceptance of updates

Change History:

  • July 14, 2025: Enhanced AI training disclosures and user rights
  • July 14, 2025: Added international data transfer safeguards
  • July 14, 2025: Expanded privacy rights and control options
  • July 14, 2025: Updated retention periods and deletion procedures

ACKNOWLEDGMENT: BY USING CHARLEY, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ, UNDERSTOOD, AND AGREE TO THE COLLECTION, USE, AND DISCLOSURE OF YOUR INFORMATION AS DESCRIBED IN THIS PRIVACY POLICY. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THESE PRACTICES, YOU MUST NOT USE OUR SERVICES.
